original_text: It was revealed to them that they were serving not themselves but you, in the things that have now been announced to you through those who preached the good news to you by the Holy Spirit sent from heaven, things into which angels long to look.
korean_text: 이 섬긴 바가 자기를 위한 것이 아니요 너희를 위한 것임이 계시로 알게 되었으니 이것은 하늘로부터 보내신 성령을 힘입어 복음을 전하는 자들로 이제 너희에게 알린 것이요 천사들도 살펴 보기를 원하는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: that they were serving not themselves but you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신이 아닌 너희를 섬기고 있었다

sentences.original_text: in the things that have now been announced to you
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희에게 선포된 그 일들에 대하여

sentences.original_text: through those who preached the good news to you
by the Holy Spirit sent from heaven
things into which angels long to look.
